Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Lelion Way, north of the Caretaking Facility.
Room.LongDescription: A small bakery is located on the north side of the road, providing bread and other pasteries to the community. On the south side of the road is the Oceancrest Caretaking Facility for the Mortally Wounded, which also takes care of people who may have had some mishaps in the local arenas or playing in sewers.
